title: Bonus: Fadbusting with Freakonomics
description: Open office plans. Learning styles. 10,000 hours of practice. Freakonomics host Stephen Dubner joins Adam for a live conversation to reveal why some popular workplace fads might be bogus—and what to do instead. This episode is made possible with the support of Accenture, Bonobos, Hilton, and JPMorgan Chase & Co.
itunes:subtitle: Why some popular workplace fads might be bogus—and what to do instead.
author: podcasts@ted.com (TED)
